name: Slots - Classic Vegas - Free Vegas Slots Casino Games
name_original: Slots - Classic Vegas - Free Vegas Slots Casino Games
description:
No more thinking that mobile slot play doesn’t “feel quite right.” You’ve been waiting for classic slots play that will make you feel like you’re in front of a real machine - and it’s finally here! Welcome to the old school Las Vegas casino you’ve been waiting for - Classic Vegas!

***Featuring:***

* FREE Bonus Coins!
* NEW slots all the time!
* VIP Perks!
* Progressive Jackpots!
* BIG Wins!
* FANTASTIC graphics!
* REAL Vegas feel!

***More About Classic Vegas***

** Familiarity: You’ll find the classic symbols you want to chase - Go after Wild Cherries, Bars, Lucky Clovers! And don’t worry, we haven’t forgotten everyone’s favorite: lucky number 7! Not only are all the classic symbols here, but they look and feel like the real thing!

** Authenticity: Great classic slot machines that are exactly like the real thing! You’ll feel like you’re there - sitting on a stool, pushing the buttons, and hearing the wins add up as you play! The only difference is that your mobile device lets you take the action with you! Plus - Classic Vegas has real Progressive Jackpot play - just like Vegas!

** Hospitality: In Classic Vegas, you’re a real VIP - get free coins from bonuses every day! Claim them and keep spinning! Plus, as you take advantage of VIP casino discounts, watch your VIP card get even more exclusive, plus earn bigger daily bonuses and more.

** Simplicity: Three reels, classic symbols, and real slot action - you won’t be bogged down with complex rules or pay tables in Classic Vegas. You’re free to just kick back and have a great time doing what you came to do: fill the hoppers with winnings!

Your search for an awesome new take on old Vegas is over! Classic Vegas is here! Get ready to SPIN, WIN and have FUN!

Classic Vegas wants to hear your feedback. We want to make this game the best it can be for you! If you have any questions or queries, email us at support@foxcubgames.com

This game is targeted for an adult audience (21+). This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at this game does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
